00031 TableInfo::TableInfo(MasterClientPtr &master_client,
00032                      const TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schema)
00033     : m_master_client(master_client),
00034       m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema(schema) {
00035 }

00038 bool TableInfo::remove(const String &end_row) {
00039   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00040   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00041 
00042   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00043     return false;
00044 
00045   HT_INFOF("Removing %s(%d)[end=%s] from TableInfo",
00046            m_identifier.name, m_identifier.id, end_row.c_str());
00047 
00048   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00049 
00050   return true;
00051 }

00053 
00054 bool
00055 TableInfo::change_end_row(const String &old_end_row,
00056                           const String &new_end_row) {
00057   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00058   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(old_end_row);
00059 
00060   HT_INFOF("Changing end row %s(%d)[old=%s,new=%s] for TableInfo",
00061            m_identifier.name, m_identifier.id, 
00062            old_end_row.c_str(), new_end_row.c_str());
00063 
00064   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00065     return false;
00066 
00067   RangePtr range = (*iter).second;
00068 
00069   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00070 
00071   iter = m_range_map.find(new_end_row);
00072 
00073   HT_ASSERT(iter == m_range_map.end());
00074 
00075   m_range_map[new_end_row] = range;
00076 
00077   return true;
00078 }

00081 void TableInfo::dump_range_table() {
00082   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00083   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00084        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter) {
00085     cout << m_identifier.name << "[" << (*iter).second->start_row() << ".."
00086          << (*iter).second->end_row() << "]" << endl;
00087   }
00088 }

00091 bool TableInfo::get_range(const RangeSpec *range_spec, RangePtr &range) {
00092   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00093   string end_row = range_spec->end_row;
00094 
00095   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00096 
00097   if (iter == m_range_map.end()) {
00098     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"TableInfo couldn't find end row ("<< end_row <<")"<< HT_END;
00099 
00100     for (iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter)
00101       HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"TableInfo map: "<< (*iter).first << HT_END;
00102 
00103     return false;
00104   }
00105 
00106   range = (*iter).second;
00107 
00108   string start_row = range->start_row();
00109 
00110   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range_spec->start_row)) {
00111     HT_INFO_OUT <<"TableInfo start row mismatch '" << start_row << "' != '"
00112                 << range_spec->start_row << "'" << HT_END;
00113     range = 0;
00114     return false;
00115   }
00116 
00117   return true;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 bool TableInfo::remove_range(const RangeSpec *range_spec, RangePtr &range) {
00122   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00123   string end_row = range_spec->end_row;
00124 
00125   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00126 
00127   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00128     return false;
00129 
00130   HT_INFOF("Removing range %s(%d)[end=%s] from TableInfo",
00131            m_identifier.name, m_identifier.id, end_row.c_str());
00132 
00133   range = (*iter).second;
00134 
00135   string start_row = range->start_row();
00136 
00137   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range_spec->start_row))
00138     return false;
00139 
00140   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00141 
00142   return true;
00143 }

00145 
00146 void TableInfo::add_range(RangePtr &range) {
00147   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00148   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(range->end_row());
00149   assert(iter == m_range_map.end());
00150   HT_INFOF("Adding range (%d) %s to TableInfo",
00151            m_identifier.id, range->get_name().c_str());
00152   m_range_map[range->end_row()] = range;
00153 }

00155 
00156 bool
00157 TableInfo::find_containing_range(const String &row, RangePtr &range,
00158                                  String &start_row, String &end_row) {
00159   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00160 
00161   RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.lower_bound(row);
00162 
00163   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00164     return false;
00165 
00166   start_row = (*iter).second->start_row();
00167   end_row = (*iter).second->end_row();
00168 
00169   if (row <= start_row)
00170     return false;
00171 
00172   range = (*iter).second;
00173 
00174   return true;
00175 }

00178 void TableInfo::get_range_vector(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec) {
00179   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00180   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00181        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter)
00182     range_vec.push_back((*iter).second);
00183 }

00185 
00186 int32_t TableInfo::get_range_count() {
00187   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00188   return m_range_map.size();
00189 }

00191 
00192 void TableInfo::clear() {
00193   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00194   HT_INFOF("Clearing map for table %s(%d)",
00195            m_identifier.name, m_identifier.id);
00196   m_range_map.clear();
00197 }
00198 
00199 void TableInfo::update_schema(SchemaPtr &schema_ptr) {
00200   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00201   // Update individual ranges
00202   for (RangeMap::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin();
00203        iter != m_range_map.end(); ++iter) {
00204     iter->second->update_schema(schema_ptr);
00205   }
00206   // update table info
00207   m_schema = schema_ptr;
00208 }

00216 TableInfo *TableInfo::create_shallow_copy() {
00217   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00218   return new TableInfo(m_master_client, &m_identifier, m_schema);
00219 }
